about_the_game:
Are they birds? Are they planes? No, they’re the Lumberhill developers!

You can now dress for success with 6 free anniversary skins. Created by 2BIGo, they actually are 2BIGo! Meet the developer team behind your beloved crazy party game and put yourself in their shoes—literally.

Become one with the team:
  • Bolo the Golden-Haired—programmer and game designer—bossed the team around
  • Adam the Blacksmith—programmer and porting programmer—worked on multiplayer mode
  • Łasic the Bucketman—level designer—created levels that you struggle with
  • Hoki the Baseball Cap—character designer—created dozens of original characters
  • Kewin the Bald—graphic designer—developed the game’s art style
  • Pietras the Postman—music composer and visual effects artist—made the prototype of Lumberhill buzzing with effects

Are they birds? Are they planes? No, they’re the Lumberhill developers!

You can now dress for success with 6 free anniversary skins. Created by 2BIGo, they actually are 2BIGo! Meet the developer team behind your beloved crazy party game and put yourself in their shoes—literally.

Become one with the team:

name: Lumberhill – Dev Skin Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WIN7-64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i3-2100 / AMD A8-5600k
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 630 / Radeon HD 6570
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: WIN7-64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i5-650 / AMD A10-5800K
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 650 / Radeon HD 7510
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card

short_description: Lumberhill is a crazy multiplayer party game in which lumberjacks try to get their tasks done while nature fights them every step of the way. Race against the clock, fulfill tasks, fight wildfires, pirates, and extremely annoying monkeys as you travel around the world and through time.
supported_languages:
English*, Polish, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Japanese, Portuguese - Portugal, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Italian, Korean, Thai, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
